attributes.additional_details: We have to under 16 months and we should be able to take one each but you can't as it's predominantly female changeing for kids
attributes.background: I believe there should be baby changeing in all toilets for male and female

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Require baby changing facilities in all public toilets
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642043
